alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:00PM EDT until April 01 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DOUGHERTY...NORTHWESTERN BAKER...SOUTHEASTERN CALHOUN AND NORTHEASTERN EARLY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA... At 259 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arlington, or 8 miles south of Morgan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Arlington, Leary, Douglasville, Iveys Mill, Milford, Crestview, Holt, Commissary Hill, Bermuda, Elmodel Wma, Patmos, Dickey, Rowena and Bethany. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
